title: The Cliff's Edge
tagline: A father's impossible house becomes the battleground for a family's legacy.
themes: The Weight of Concrete vs. The Weight of Memory

chapters.title: The Last of the Good Cement
The Ghost of the Old House

story: Write a scene where a character discovers a hidden letter or object in the walls of the old house, revealing a secret about the mother.
Draft a monologue from Emilio's perspective, decades earlier, as he first stakes his claim on the cliff's edge.
Imagine a chapter from the point of view of the local cement supplier, caught between Lorenzo's demands and his own survival.
Write a 'deleted scene' of a conversation Soledad has with a gallery owner in Madrid, where she tries to explain the art she's selling and thinks of the concrete skeleton back home.
technical: Design a simple web-based 'Structural Integrity Calculator' where users input variables (cement grade, rebar spacing, wind load) to see if Emilio's house would theoretically stand.
Create a 'Generational Dialogue Map' visualization tool that charts the frequency and tone of spoken exchanges between Lorenzo, Soledad, and Emilio across the 24 chapters.

cover_prompt: A solitary, brutalist concrete house perched impossibly on the jagged edge of a coastal cliff, its sharp geometric forms defying gravity and erosion, with a single figure of a man seen from behind in a distant window, [Detailed Scene & Context: the structure shows hairline fractures in the concrete and the relentless ocean below churns against the rocks, a worn path leads to the house but ends abruptly, suggesting isolation], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric style of Hiroshi Sugimoto's seascapes combined with the minimalist architectural tension of Luisa Lambri, rendered as a large format photographic print with immense detail and grain], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, an extreme wide shot from a low angle that emphasizes the cliff's drop and the house's precarious dominance, centered composition to create a stark, iconic silhouette against the sky], [Lighting & Color Palette: bleak, overcast daylight with a muted, monochromatic palette of concrete grays, ocean foam whites, and stormy sky blues, with a single cold highlight on the window, conveying a mood of solemn permanence and silent tension], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
